General.Name: Shanxi Tond Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanxi Tond Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of civil explosives in China. It offers expanded and rock expanded ammonium nitrate, porous granular ammonium fuel explosives, emulsion explosives, rock emulsion explosives, powdered emulsion explosives, and rock powder emulsion explosives. The company also provides silica for general rubbers, tires, carriers, and silicone; silicon dioxide aerosol, silica thickener, thixotropic agent, silica for coil coating, silicon dioxide for inkjet, and silica matting agent; and engineering blasting services. Its products are used in coal and non-coal mines, infrastructure construction, and special blasting operations. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Xinzhou, China.
